I0D-in: When you drink this potion you are cursed with lycanthropy for 1 hour. During this time you will be able take the form of your chosen beast and will retain the ability until the hour expires.
I1D-in: Once consumed the drinker must make a DC5 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the effect of the potion is permanent. This DC save increases by 5 each time the potion is consumed by that same user.
I2D-in: This potion bottle is covered in fur, the ingredients resemble a thick sludge that sloshes about within the bottle, when opened, bestial snarls, howls and wails emanate from within.
